Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Granville
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to a track problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to a track problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
